attributes.slidertext:
EQUIPPING AND EMPOWERING
THE GLOBAL CHURCH OF JESUS
attributes.human:
Have you wondered what took place at the cross? Travel back in time to witness how Jesus bore your sins, condemnation, curses, sicknesses and even death on the cross just for you. Watch this video and experience afresh God’s amazing love for you through the mighty cross!
